features: Soft, lightweight knit construction delivers superior comfort & breathability
Material wicks sweat & dries really fast
Curved hem for a more flattering silhouette
body.description: Everyone needs a go-to pair of shorts. With side hand pockets and a soft, smooth waistband—these women's training shorts are it. Soft, lightweight knit construction delivers superior comfort & breathability. Material wicks sweat & dries really fast. Anti-pill/anti-pick finish adds extra durability. Updated exposed elastic printed waistband. Convenient side hand pockets. Curved hem for a more flattering silhouette. Inseam: 3"". Loose: Fuller cut for complete comfort. 100% Polyester.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars cheaper on here than in stores
reviews.reviewText: Saw these shorts for $30 in store but didn't want to pay that much. I hopped on Amazon and found the exact same shorts for $12.95. I bought the black version with white letters on the waistband; I know the other more popular colors were more expensive, but these were a steal for that price! They are true Under Armor brand, came with all the tags etc. Fabric is super soft and has great stretch. I'm 5'6" about 117 lbs and the small fits perfect. They have nice deep pockets, and look very flattering on the body without having to be skin tight and super short like most other girls wear. I appreciate shorts that still look cute, without having to show the world my every nook & cranny.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love these shorts! They are my favorite pair of shorts! I wear them all the time! They are so comfortable, sooo cute, they literally go with any top! They are super lightweight but also a really nice quality material! They wipe off really easily if you have a little spill. The size was spot on! These are just an all-around awesome pair of shorts! I will definitely be ordering many more colors!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love they way they fit and look on -and so does my husband! I love that they have pockets as well and that the pockets are actually big enough to hold my phone! Very nicely made! Bought another pair as well! I'm between a small and a medium. I'm 5'5" and 152lbs. The small fits me great! I bought a medium for my second pair, on accident, and had to return them because they were too big, made it look like a had a dick. They were big in the crotch area, didn't like that. Super comfy and would totally buy more!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great athletic shorts
reviews.reviewText: This shorts are great for workouts and very comfortable. The pockets are great to have.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It's nice workout, relax pants.
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my 11 yrs old daughter. She grows up so fast and size S fit well. The material is well made. Soft and comfortable for outdoor. Workout and all. I just placed one for myself. I wish all black or dark colors are cost less $ or discount as well I sure will order them more. Lol But gray if pretty too.Actually my standard size is MBut I read the reviews I ordered the size down ( s) it's perfect fit . I'm 5" and 130 lbs.Can't beat this deal and I love they are nice size of pockets.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Material is awesome it’s not poofy like the other similar shorts I tried. The material is nice and fits your skin without being too tight or too loose.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 9, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Too large for my twins, but work for my thin 16 yo in XS size.
reviews.reviewText: These are fabulous quality, under armor ‘workout’ shorts. They are very flattering, and perfect for the athletic woman or girl.They didn’t quite fit my 84 lb., 5 foot tall, twin girls. (Sz. XS) They were a bit loose at the waist, and a bit long, so if you want a shorter fit, go for the 2.0, if you are around their height, which is what I reordered for them in size XXS.My 108lb., 5’5’’ tall daughter fits into these perfectly, in size XS. Perfect shorts for her gym class! I tried them on, since I now have two.. well, I gave her one, and I’m 5’6’’ and 128 lbs., and the XS fits me too, but not much of any ‘crazy amount’ of room to spare. But they fit nicely.The elastic waist helps to fit a wide array of waist sizes. She is a 24 and I’m a 27. These work! Not sure if I’ll return the extra pair or keep them for me, but they are nice, light-weight, quality running shorts, at a great price. Now I see why they are hard to get your hands on, as I’ve never tried this brand before! I’ve ordered several since this purchase in Xxs and XS.5 stars!!!I hope you found my review to be helpful :).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars High quality shorts that won’t disappoint
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I love everything from Under Armour. These shorts are no exception, they look and feel great. I love the trim on the waistband. They are stretchy around the waist and more loose fitting around the bottom. They also have pockets and the material is breathable which is perfect for long days outside in the summer heat. 10/10 recommend.
Size is perfect and just as advertised!
Buen precio buena calidad amplió y lindo muy comodo
the only kind I wear. I am a size 28 in jeans and small fits well

Están super bonitos y cómodos. Calidad del textil y de secado rápido. Están cortos por lo que uso unas licras abajo para evitar inconvenientes, pero justo que estén cortos los hace ver super juveniles y las piernas lucen bonitas.

reviews.reviewTitle: Atención: 1X no es lo mismo que XL
reviews.reviewText: Normalmente soy talla L, tengo muchísimos de estos shorts en distintos colores y me gustan mucho, hace poco quise un short que me quedara aguado y mas grande, así que pedí un XL y me quedó justo como quería, y ahora pedí uno que decía 1X que estaba a buen precio, pero me di cuenta que XL no es lo mismo que 1X, 1X es muchísimo más grande, me quedó gigante, parece short de basketball jajaja. Fue mi error pensar que eran lo mismo pero al parecer las que aparecen como “1X, 2X” son tallas plus size de personas curvy, contrario a un XL, XXL. De hecho el short que recibí se notaba que había sido una devolución, seguramente por el mismo error.
